name: Fruit Link: Blast Mania Game In Farm World 4 Kids
name_original: Fruit Link: Blast Mania Game In Farm World 4 Kids
description:
Fruit Link: Blast Mania Game In Farm World 4 Kids. Connect two or more fruit to crush them, and try to get as many score as possible!

Fruit Link: Blast Mania Game In Farm World 4 Kids a very sweet and addictive match three puzzle game!

Connect two or more fruit to crush them, and try to get as many score as possible!

Enjoy this Saga game alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

-------------------------------

How to play:

● Connect two or more same cute fruit.

● Achieve the target score to pass a game level.

● Eliminate the more candies in one line can get more extra scores
.
-------------------------------

Game mode:

● More than 200 challenging levels & many game props.

● Easy to learn but hard to game master.

● Fantastic and cute UI & cool animation effects.

● Very small size but super tasty graphics

● Create a high score in your friends circle

-------------------------------

Please contact us directly via email if you find an issue Fruit Link: Blast Mania Game In Farm World 4 Kids ? or have a suggestion for us, that will surely help us to improve this game.

We look forward to receive your feedback about this game for further improvement. Hope this game can bring the excited moment for all of you guys.
